name: Classic Grilled Shrimp Tacos with Chipotle Crema
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1-2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, finely chopped (plus 1 teaspoon adobo sauce)
1/4 cup shredded cabbage or slaw mix
instructions: In a bowl, toss shrimp with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Let marinate for 15 minutes.
Grill shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side, or until pink and cooked through. Be careful not to overcook.
While shrimp is grilling, prepare the chipotle crema: In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, sour cream, chipotle peppers (and adobo sauce), and lime juice. Adjust to taste.
Warm the corn tortillas on a dry skillet or in the microwave.
To assemble tacos: Fill each tortilla with grilled shrimp, a spoonful of chipotle crema, shredded cabbage, and chopped cilantro.
